translations: 给……取绰号（nicknamed 的过去式，过去分词）

sentences.sentence: When he got older I nicknamed him Little Alf.
sentences.translation: 他长大些后，我给他起了绰号“小阿尔夫”。

sentences.sentence: Nicknamed the Southern Pinwheel, M83 is undergoing more rapid star formation than our own Milky Way galaxy, especially in its nucleus.
sentences.translation: 绰号“南方风车”的M83正在经历比我们银河系更快的恒星形成过程，特别是在它的核心。
